extends java.lang.Object

    int id,
    java.lang.String description,
    java.util.List<Vector2D> points)
        Constructs a new room
        Parameters:
        light - The lighting of the room
        id - The room's id
        description - The room's description
        points - The list of points which make up the room's shape
        doors - The list of doors in the room which maps to which wall it belongs to
